Authorization.description: HTTP Basic Authentication/API Key. Basic Auth requires a username and a password. For the username, use a valid API key. Ritc accepts the API key as both plaintext and base64 encoded. Remember that you must append a colon after the api key in order to avoid being prompted for a password. The format is Base64encode(api-key:)
Authorization.name: Authorization
